channel.title: == doesn't work
channel.description:
ok, i just realized i cannot use ==. i have to use .equals(), like instead of [code]if (playerRights == 1)[/code] i have to use [code]if (playerRights.equals(1))[/code]
Any clues as to why it might be like that?

item.title: == doesn't work
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

lol actually its not a source :|, its my chat server for my rs2 server(kinda like ghetto irc?), but it is coded in java, and i thought things like == or >= or != were like standard java, but yea…i was working on a color thing for it and it wouldn’t work until i used .equals()

Read full topic
